meanings.sent1: The brave soldier was a skilled saluters.
meanings.sent2: The saluters lined up to show respect.
meanings.sent3: The little boy pretended to be a saluters, saluting his toy soldiers.
meanings.sent4: The trees in the forest stood tall like saluters, reaching towards the sky.
meanings.sent5: The image of the saluters in uniform was etched in his memory.

meanings.definition: Those who greet or acknowledge with a salute.
meanings.sent1: The crowd of saluters waved enthusiastically.
meanings.sent2: The saluters raised their hands in a respectful gesture.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends jokingly saluted each other as saluters.
meanings.sent4: The mountains in the distance seemed to be saluters, welcoming us to the valley.
meanings.sent5: The line of saluters outside the palace was a sight to behold.
